definitions.definition: As a stone ( used with following adjective ) .
examples: My father is stone deaf. This soup is stone cold.

definitions.definition: Absolutely , completely ( used with following adjectives ) .
examples: I went stone crazy after she left.
I said the medication made my vision temporarily blurry, it did not make me stone blind.

main_definition: As a stone ( used with following adjective ) .
secondary_definitions: ( slang ) Absolutely , completely ( used with following adjectives ) .
